articles.description: Donte Clark scored 26 points with nine rebounds and five assists and Texas Southern beat Jackson State 86-75 on Saturday night.
articles.headline: Clark with 26 leads Texas Southern past Jackson State 86-75

articles.description: David Collette scored 18 points on 9-of-10 shooting in a dominant performance around the paint and led Utah to a 77-43 win over California on Saturday night.
articles.headline: Utah dominates California for 77-43 win

articles.description: Rui Hachimura scored 23 points and No. 12 Gonzaga kept the ball out of Jock Landale's hands to end the nation's longest active winning streak at 19 games with a 78-65 victory over No. 11 Saint Mary's on Saturday night.
articles.headline: Gonzaga snaps Saint Mary's 19-game win streak, 78-65

images.caption: Rui Hachimura gets past three St. Mary's defenders and hits a tricky layup for a chance at a 3-point play.
images.name: Gonzaga's Hachimura scores tough basket for and-1

articles.description: Evan Leonard scored 18 points and Tommy Rutherford scored 15 and UC Irvine beat UC Riverside 62-52 on Saturday night.
articles.headline: UC Irvine downs UC Riverside 62-52 behind Leonard's 18 PTs
